p.k: Gruesome Discovery Police investigate the real-life case of a woman whose body was found in a rubbish bin. Could she have been the victim of a co-worker's violent obsession?
Pickaxe Murders Houston, Texas, is rocked by a grisly crime scene - a man whose head is practically hammered off his body and a semi-nude woman riddled
Speed Freak Killers A drug-fuelled killing spree terrorises a small California town. Police believe they are dealing with a serial killer who lives quietly among them
82% Flashing Colours Police have 48 hours to chase down a lead when a teenager gets caught up in a gang's deadly feud
82% Love Hate/A Soldier's Life In Tulsa, a woman goes on the run after her boyfriend is killed, while in Atlanta an Army veteran is gunned down after helping a homeless man
Dead On Target When a young father-to-be is shot dead by a single bullet fired from afar, it's up to Lieutenant Joe Kenda to hunt down the bloodthirsty sniper
Make My Day The documentary series continues as retired Colorado Springs police detective Joseph Kenda reflects on another harrowing case
Gruesome Discovery Police investigate the real-life case of a woman whose body was found in a rubbish bin. Could she have been the victim of a co-worker's violent obsession?
82% Flashing Colours Police have 48 hours to chase down a lead when a teenager gets caught up in a gang's deadly feud
78% Dermot Murnaghan returns to uncover the truth behind the horrific crimes of Peterborough serial killer Joanna Dennehy
Till Death Do Us Part The terrible truth about the death of loving wife Collette Daffin, mown down in a hit and run accident in Derbyshire in 2009

p.n: I Lived With A Killer I (2)
p.k: New. Craigslist Killer Richard Beasley's daughter discusses her serial killer dad and her devastation at learning her unwitting assistance had been used in the worst way
New. Blood on the Tracks A decapitated body is discovered on some train tracks and a young girl's body is found in a basement. Lt Joe Kenda investigates both murders
New. Murder On The Menu Detectives grill a host of suspects when they discover the dumped and dismembered body of a chef. Can forensics confirm his unlikely killer?
Monster at the Gates Reality series following US detectives as they reconstruct murder victims' catastrophic final hours to help catch their killers
82% The Other Wife When a man is gunned down protecting his wife, police detectives hope his ex-wife can reveal who may have wanted him killed
Tighten the Screws The death of an Iraq War veteran is investigated
From gang shootings and drug busts to high-speed car chases and bar fights, this documentary series follows the tireless work of the US police force
From gang shootings and drug busts to high-speed car chases and bar fights, this documentary series follows the tireless work of the US police force
New. Good Sister, Bad Sister The bond between two sisters is put to the ultimate test when one asks the other to kill her husband
New. The Texas Cadet Murders When a teenage girl is found beaten and shot to death in Texas, the pressure is on police to figure out who she is, who killed her and why
82% A Bad Run-In/Inferno Detectives race the clock when an elderly man perishes in a suspicious fire and a man is killed in front of his two-year-old daughter
My Sister Was Murdered At Work By Her Ex Chloe Gazzard discusses how her sister Hollie was stabbed to death by her ex-boyfriend at the salon where she worked
New. Good Sister, Bad Sister The bond between two sisters is put to the ultimate test when one asks the other to kill her husband
